topics.body:
"@*sigh*":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55adc79e6368725ea60003b1#post_55adc79e6368725ea60003b1
[bq="*sigh*"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55adc74b6368725ea6000357#post_55adc74b6368725ea6000357
[bq="uc9"]"@*sigh*":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55adc6b06368722f6f002f8e#post_55adc6b06368722f6f002f8e
[bq="*sigh*"]And yet you're on Derpibooru? Bah, I won't question it, label-denyers are one of the few mentalities I can't wrap my brain around.[/bq]
I don't even watch the show or anything.[/bq]
Then how are you here? Did you just stumble across a thread in this forum and decide, "hey I'll stick around"?[/bq]
Nah; I used to be a brony but went "fuck it" and stopped watching it cause neckbeards in the fandom wouldn't shut the fuck up about the equestria girls movie.

Honestly I thought the equestria girls movie was mediocre, but some fuckwit literally screamed at my face in real life that I wasn't "allowed" to be a part of "his" fandom that "belonged" to him so I went "fuck it dropped" and stopped caring about the show.

*Most* fandoms I join I'm not all that attached to; if someone starts screaming at my face telling me what I'm "allowed"/"not allowed" to enjoy most of the time I'm not interested enough to put up with that shit.

If someone starts screaming in your face during a college lecture I don't think most people here would have to patience to put up with people like that.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55adc89e63687253c4000648#post_55adc89e63687253c4000648
You know there is a third option. You could just refuse to engage with screaming neckbeards and cut out all the stuff related to drama in a given fandom.

That's what I do at any rate, its why I rarely actually bother discussing the show and nope the fuck out of any conversation that looks like its going to turn into a screaming match. Or try to at any rate.

Basically I'm not gonna let assholes define what I do or don't like either way, because fuck em, what are they gonna do about it?

God, I should never make comments on that site.
